name: banco-distribuido
description: Sistema bancario distribuido con workers, coordinador y frontend

scripts.install:all: bun install && cd frontend && bun install && cd ../worker && bun install && cd ../coordinador && bun install
scripts.dev: concurrently "bun run dev:worker" "bun run dev:coordinador" "bun run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:worker: cd worker && PORT=${PORT:-3001} bun run dev
scripts.dev:worker:3001: cd worker && PORT=3001 bun run dev
scripts.dev:worker:3002: cd worker && PORT=3002 bun run dev
scripts.dev:worker:3003: cd worker && PORT=3003 bun run dev
scripts.start: concurrently "bun run start:worker" "bun run start:coordinador" "bun run start:frontend"
